title: Relationship Theory on Inspiring Your Partner to Exceed Expectations
description: Tom Bilyeu and Lisa Bilyeu (@lisabilyeu) dive into topics such as: * Why full disclosure in a relationship is important. * How to motivate your partner when they are not motivating themselves. * How to mitigate your work and manage expectations from your partner. * Whether or not to start a relationship while you’re on your journey to success or wait until you’re successful. * How to be vulnerable when negotiating time and discussing values with one another. *And much more... Tom Bilyeu is the co-founder of 2014 Inc. 500 company Quest Nutrition — a unicorn startup valued at over $1 billion — and the co-founder and host of Impact Theory. Impact Theory is a first-of-its-kind company designed to facilitate global change through the incubation of mission-based businesses and the cultivation of empowering content. Every piece of content Impact Theory creates is meant to underscore the company mission to free people from The Matrix and help them unlock their true potential. Impact Theory exists to inspire the next generation of game-changing companies and creators that will make a true and lasting impact on the world.
